Dear Mridul,
I hope this message finds you well.

I wanted to follow up on the insurance update you requested. Ensuring this is finalized promptly is crucial for us to proceed with the van purchase without any delays. Please let me know if there are any outstanding details or actions required from my side to expedite the process.

Your swift response will help us maintain momentum and achieve our shared goals effectively.

Looking forward to your update.


Best regards,

Jackie Merchant 
EV Leasing & Rental
